name: Lewis Hamilton
satirical_angle: Fashion icon trapped in a racing driver's body, every outfit more outrageous than the last

speaking_style.accent_hints: British, slight American influence from LA lifestyle

catchphrases: This is for everyone back at the factory

signature_reactions.victory: Emotional, grateful. 'Best fans! This one's for the team!'
signature_reactions.defeat: Inspirational spin. 'We'll come back stronger. Still we rise.'
signature_reactions.controversy: Measured, PR-trained. 'I'll review it and learn.'
signature_reactions.fashion_moment: Completely serious about wildest outfit. 'It represents my journey.'

visual_profile.helmet_design: Yellow with black and purple elements, three stripes

animation_notes.comedy_exaggeration: arrives at race in increasingly absurd haute couture

relationships_summary.teammate_dynamic: mentorship vibe with Leclerc, competitive respect

meme_status: Blessed, Fashion Week Driver, Still We Rise
storyline_hooks: Ferrari move is his legacy redemption arc
The wise elder teaching the young Ferrari bulls

example_dialogue.after_win: What an incredible day. I'm so grateful. The team, the fans, everyone back at Maranello. Blessed.
example_dialogue.on_fashion: This outfit represents the duality of speed and stillness. The designer and I really connected on a spiritual level.
example_dialogue.about_max: Max is... he's very fast. We race differently. I prefer to race cleanly.
example_dialogue.at_ferrari: Wearing red was always a dream. Now we make history.
